remarks: The partial isomorphism A for a lattice ` K ` .  Definition of isomorphism map in [Crawley] p. 120 line 24.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2013.)
statement:
diaval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diaval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diaval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diaval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaval.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaval $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) = { f e. T | ( R ` f ) .<_ X } ) $.
$d K f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
$d X f $.
